document.full_text: a yemeni al qaeda militant arrested in the pakistani city of karachi was a "mid-level" operative and explosives expert involved in plotting attacks in pakistan and afghanistan, security officials alleged on wednesday.
document.title: yemeni caught in pakistan "mid-level al qaeda operative"
lines_and_colors: a yemeni al qaeda militant arrested in the pakistani city of karachi was a "mid-level" operative and explosives expert involved in plotting attacks in pakistan and afghanistan, security officials alleged on wednesday.
